members.member:
A simple component that references a IgnoreCollidersWhileGrabbing component that uses the 'OverrideUnignoreDelegate' delegate event to delay the unginore collisions for some time.
This component references an IgnoreCollidersWhileGrabbing component instead of being forced onto the same GameObject because frequently a developer may want to disable the relevant GameObject after release, this allows this component to be put on a separate non-deactivated GameObject while still allowing the unignore collisions delay.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Collisions.DelayUnignoreCollidersOnRelease.UnignoreEntry.grabber
member.summary: The Grabber to unignore collisions with.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Collisions.DelayUnignoreCollidersOnRelease.UnignoreEntry.grabbable
member.summary: The GrabbableObject that was associated with the collision ignore event.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Collisions.DelayUnignoreCollidersOnRelease.UnignoreEntry.unignoreTime
member.summary: The Time.time to unignore the collision at.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Collisions.DelayUnignoreCollidersOnRelease.UnignoreEntry.unignoreColliders
member.summary: The array of Colliders to unignore.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Collisions.DelayUnignoreCollidersOnRelease.m_UnignoreEntries
member.summary: The list of pending 'unignore entries'.

members.member:
A component intended to be attached to a GrabbableObject that subscribes to the relevant 'Grabbed' and 'Released' events to ignore collisions between some colliders and a Grabber while it is holding an object.
NOTE: This component does not manage triggers.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Collisions.IgnoreCollidersWhileGrabbing.Grabbable
member.summary: A reference to the GrabbableObject associated with this component.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Collisions.IgnoreCollidersWhileGrabbing.OverrideUnignoreDelegate
member.summary: A delegate event that allows the 'unignore collisions' behaviour to be overridden by anything that subscribes to this event. The boolean argument is passed as a reference, when flipped to true the original unignore collisions behaviour will be skipped. Arg0: Grabber - The grabber whose collisions are ignored with 'colliders'. Arg1: GrabbableObject - The grabbable object who is associated with the collision ignore event. Arg2: Collider[] - The array of Colliders the grabber is ignoring. Arg3: ref bool - The 'skip unignore collisions' boolean reference that when made true will make the 'unignore collisions' behaviour of this component get skipped.

member.name: T:GrabSystem.Delegates.ActionRef`1
member.summary: A simple delegate for events where an argument is passed by reference.
member.typeparam: The type of the passed reference.
member.param: The reference that was passed.

member.name: T:GrabSystem.Delegates.ActionRef`2
member.summary: A simple delegate for events where an argument is passed by reference.
member.typeparam: The type of the fist passed value.
The type of the passed reference.
member.param: The first value that was passed.
The reference that was passed.

member.name: T:GrabSystem.Delegates.ActionRef`3
member.summary: A simple delegate for events where an argument is passed by reference.
member.typeparam: The type of the first passed value.
The type of the second passed value.
The type of the passed reference.
member.param: The first value that was passed.
The second value that was passed.
The reference that was passed.

member.name: T:GrabSystem.Delegates.ActionRef`4
member.summary: A simple delegate for events where an argument is passed by reference.
member.typeparam: The type of the first passed value.
The type of the second passed value.
The type of the third passed value.
The type of the passed reference.
member.param: The first value that was passed.
The second value that was passed.
The third value that was passed.
The reference that was passed.

member.name: T:GrabSystem.GrabberUnityEvent
member.summary: Arg0: Grabber - The Grabber involved in this grab event.

member.name: T:GrabSystem.GrabUnityEvent
member.summary: Arg0: Grabber - The Grabber involved in this grab event. Arg1: GrabbableObject - The GrabbableObject that was involved in the event.

members.member:
A component that is generally NOT attached to the same GameObject as a DistanceGrabber that must be referenced to enable assisted catching. This is NOT attached to the same GameObject as a DistanceGrabber to avoid triggering unwanted components.
When a distance grabbable that is being distance grabbed by the relevant distance grabber triggers this component an instantenous grab is performed.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

A component that can be attached to the same GameObject as a GrabbableObject that allows a Grabber to instantly grab it from a distance.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.Grabbable
member.summary: The GrabbableObject component that this component is converting into a distance grabbable.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.Target
member.summary: A reference to the GrabbableObject being targetted by distance DistanceGrabbable, otherwise null.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.LastTarget
member.summary: The last set target of the distance grabbable, otherwise null if there was none. This reference remains valid after the distance grab is stopped. (This updates immediately when a new valid target is set and will at that point be equal to Target.)

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.TargetLocalHitPoint
member.summary: The point the target hit this distance grabbable at during selection in the distance grabbables local space. This is only valid while Target != null.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.HighlightedByCount
member.summary: Returns the number of Grabbers currently highlighting this distance grabbable.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.m_HighlightedBy
member.summary: A list of all Grabbers currently highlighting this distance grabbable.

member.name: E:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.CanDistanceGrabDelegate
member.summary: A delegate even that allows distance grab permissions to be overridden by subscribing to this event and modifying the 'ref bool' argument (argument 3). Arg0: Grabber - The Grabber doing the grabbing. This Grabber is guarenteed to have a DistanceGrabber component. Arg1: GrabbableObject - The GrabbableObject being distance grabbed. This GrabbableObject is guarenteed to have a DistanceGrabbable component. Arg2: ref bool - The reference to a boolean that when changed to false (or true) forces distance grabs for this object o be denied (or approved).

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.CanDistanceGrab(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary:
Returns true if pGrabber can distance grab this, otherwise false. NOTE: This does not check all conditions for the Grabber, the Grabber may have its own conditions not specific to this Grabbable. See 'DistanceGrabber.CanDistanceGrab(DistanceGrabbable)'.
By default this method uses 'pGrabber.CanGrab(Grabbable)' to check distance grab permission. This method invokes the callback 'CanDistanceGrabDelegate' which gives scripts an opportunity to override distance grab permissions.
member.returns: true if pGrabber can distance grab this distance grabbable, otherwise false.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.InstantGrab(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Instantly grabs a distance grabbable.
member.param: The 'hit point' the grabber targeted.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.SetTarget(GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber,UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Targets the specified DistanceGrabber, or none if null. The distance grabbable will immediate start being 'grabbed' (teleported or pulled).
member.param: The DistanceGrabber that is pulling this distance grabbable.
The 'hit point' the grabber targeted.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.ClearTarget
member.summary: Clears any target of the DistanceGrabbable.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.Highlight(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Tells this DistanceGrabbable that pGrabber has started highlighting it (if it is not already highlighting it).

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.Unhighlight(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Tells this DistanceGrabbable that pGrabber has stopped highlighting it (if it is already highlighting it).

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.GetHighlightedBy(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the Grabber that is highlighting this distance grabbable by index.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.StartDistanceGrab(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Starts a distance grab.
member.param: The world space 'hit point' the grabber targeted.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.StopDistanceGrab
member.summary: Stops a distance grab.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.OnDistanceGrabStarted(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Invoked when a distance grab is started.
member.param: The world space 'hit point' the grabber targeted in world space.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable.OnDistanceGrabStopped
member.summary: Invoked when a distance grab is stopped.

members.member: A component that is attached to the same GameObject as a Grabber to enable it to grab DistanceGrabbable objects from a distance. Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.Grabber
member.summary: A reference to the Grabber associated with this DistanceGrabber.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.GrabTarget
member.summary: A reference to the Transform this distance grabber will teleport or pull distance grabbables to.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.Pulling
member.summary: A reference to the DistanceGrabbable currently being pulled by this component, or null.

member.name: E:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.CanDistanceGrabDelegate
member.summary: A delegate even that allows distance grab permissions to be overridden by subscribing to this event and modifying the 'ref bool' argument (argument 3). Arg0: Grabber - The Grabber doing the grabbing. This Grabber is guarenteed to have a DistanceGrabber component. Arg1: GrabbableObject - The GrabbableObject being distance grabbed. This GrabbableObject is guarenteed to have a DistanceGrabbable component. Arg2: ref bool - The reference to a boolean that when changed to false (or true) forces distance grabs for this object o be denied (or approved).

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.CanDistanceGrab(GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable)
member.summary: Returns true if this Grabber can distance grab pGrabbable, otherwise false.
member.returns: true if this Grabber can distance grab pGrabbable, otherwise false.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.StartPull(GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable)
member.summary: Stops any existing pull operation and starts pulling the DistanceGrabbable, pGrabbable. NOTE: This method does not check grab permissions, see 'bool CanGrab(DistanceGrabbable)'.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.StartPull(GrabSystem.DistanceGrabbable,UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Stops any existing pull operation and starts pulling the DistanceGrabbable, pGrabbable. NOTE: This method does not check grab permissions, see 'bool CanGrab(DistanceGrabbable)'.
member.param: The hit point the pull was started from.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.DistanceGrabber.StopPull
member.summary: Stops any existing pull operation.

members.member:
A component that is derived from 'DistanceGrabbable' that allows for force based grabbing of a GrabbableObject that also has a Rigidbody component. Modes: Instant - Teleports the object to the grabber and grabs it instantly (as a normal DistanceGrabbable would). Arch - Uses physics forces to pull the GameObject as an arch.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:GrabSystem.ForceDistanceGrabbable.PullMode.Instant
member.summary: Instantly teleport the distance grabbable to the Grabber.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.ForceDistanceGrabbable.PullMode.Arch
member.summary: Use physics to pull the distance grabbable in an arch.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.ForceDistanceGrabbable.m_InitialVelocityApplied
member.summary: Tracks whether or not initial velocity has been applied after the start of a distance grab. This is to ensure it is only added once since it is recommended to add it in FixedUpdate().

member.name: F:GrabSystem.ForceDistanceGrabbable.m_FixedDeltaTimeSincePull
member.summary: Cumulatively tracks Time.fixedDeltaTime that has passed each FixedUpdate() since the pull started.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.ForceDistanceGrabbable.m_LastPullVelocity
member.summary: The last pull velocity applied to the force distance grabbable.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ForceDistanceGrabbable.CalculateTrajectory(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Calculates the trajectory velocity from the target to the origin and returns it as a Vector3.
member.returns: a Vector3 representing the trajectory velocity from the target to the origin.

members.member:
A component that makes a GrabbableObject grabbable via a child collider.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

A component that makes an object grabbable by a Grabber.
NOTE: While in GrabMode.MoveObject the object will move based on the most recent grabbing hand.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: T:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GrabMode
member.summary: The mode used when grabbing this object.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GrabMode.None
member.summary: Do nothing while grabbing.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GrabMode.MaintainOffset
member.summary: Maintain the grab offset of the Grabber relative to 'MaintainGrabTransform'.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GrabMode.MoveObject
member.summary: Move the grabbed object kinematically.

member.name: T:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GrabModeChangedUnityEvent
member.summary: Arg0: GrabMode - The old grab mode. Arg1: GrabMode - The new grab mode.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.Rigidbody
member.summary: The Rigidbody component that on the same GameObject as this GrabbableObject, otherwise null if the grabbable is not a Rigidbody.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.HeldByCount
member.summary: the number of hands currently holding the GrabbableObject.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.MaintainGrabTransform
member.summary: A reference to the Transform a hand that grabs this object will maintain it's offset relative to when enabled. If null the grab point is used instead.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.CanBeGrabbed
member.summary: Returns true if this GrabbableObject can be grabbed, otherwise false. (NOTE: Use CanGrab(Grabber) methods instead to test for grabbability by specific Grabbers, this only tests for global 'can grab' properties that apply to any Grabbers.)

member.name: P:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.OffsetAtGrab
member.summary: Returns 'transform.position - grabber.transform.position' at the time of grab. This offset is in the grabbers local space.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.RotationOffsetAtGrab
member.summary: Returns the rotation offset at the time of grab. This offset is in the grabbers local space.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.MaintainOffsetOverrideDelegate
member.summary: A delegate that allows the 'Maintain Offset' behaviour to be overridden for this GrabbableObject, when the reference-passed boolean is set to true the default 'Maintain Offset' behaviour will be skipped. This is useful for implementing things such as advanced maintained grab positions that go beyond the scope of the default settings of the GrabbableObject component. Arg0: Grabber - The Grabber who is grabbing the object. Arg1: GrabbableObject - The GrabbableObject being grabbed. Arg2: ref bool - The boolean that controls whether or not to skip the default 'Maintain Offset' behaviour. When true the default behaviour is skipped.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.OverrideGrabOffsetDelegate
member.summary: A delegate that is invoked whenever GetGrabOffset(Grabber) is invoked. This is useful for implementing custom behaviours for overriding a grab offset for a GrabbableObject via code. Arg0: Grabber - The Grabber who is grabbing the object. Arg1: GrabbableObject - The GrabbableObject being grabbed. Arg2: ref Vector3 - A reference to the returned grab offset in the grabbers local space.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.OverrideGrabEulerOffsetDelegate
member.summary: A delegate that is invoked whenever GetGrabEulerOffset(Grabber) is invoked. This is useful for implementing custom behaviours for overriding a grab euler angle offset for a GrabbableObject via code. Arg0: Grabber - The Grabber who is grabbing the object. Arg1: GrabbableObject - The GrabbableObject being grabbed. Arg2: ref Vector3 - A reference to the returned grab euler offset in the grabbers local space.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.m_CachedMass
member.summary: The cached mass value for this GrabbableObjects Rigidbody component (if it has one).

member.name: F:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.m_HeldBy
member.summary: A list of Grabbers that are currently holding this object.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.SetPositionAndRotation(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Quaternion)
member.summary: Sets the position and rotation of this GrabbableObject (and its Rigidbody(s) if relevant.)

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.UpdateCachedMass
member.summary: If this grabbable has a valid Rigidbody overrides the cached 'default' mass value for the object with 'Rigidbody.mass'.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.ForceGrabbersRelease
member.summary: Forces all Grabbers to release this GrabbableObject.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.ForceGrabbersReleaseNoThrow
member.summary: Forces all Grabbers to release this GrabbableObject without throwing.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GetGrabOffset(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary:
Returns a Vector3 representing the grab offset in the pGrabbers local space for this GrabbableObject. Takes into account axis flip settings.
NOTE: This method invokes 'OverrideGrabOffsetDelegate(Grabber, GrabbableObject, ref Vector3)' for easy overriding.
member.returns: a Vector3 representing the grab offset in the pGrabbers local space for this GrabbableObject.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GetGrabEulerOffset(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary:
Returns a Vector3 representing the grab euler offset in the pGrabbers local space for this GrabbableObject. Takes into account axis flip settings.
NOTE: This method invokes 'OverrideGrabEulerOffsetDelegate(Grabber, GrabbableObject, ref Vector3)' for easy overriding.
member.returns: a Vector3 representing the grab euler offset in the pGrabbers local space for this GrabbableObject.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.GetHeldBy(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the Grabber in the given 'held by' index.
member.returns: the Grabber in the given 'held by' index.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.MaintainOffsetFrom(GrabSystem.Grabber,UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Maintains a pGrabber at pMaintainTransform.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.SetGrabEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the 'grabEnabled' field for the grabbable object. Useful for use with Unity Editor events.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.UseMoveObjectGrabMode
member.summary: Forces the GrabbableObject to use the 'MoveObject' grab mode.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.UseMaintainOffsetGrabMode
member.summary: Forces the GrabbableObject to use the 'MaintainOffset' grab mode.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.CanGrab(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Returns true if this GrabbableObject can be grabbed by pGrabber, otherwise false. (NOTE: This only checks conditions relevant to the grabbable object, the Grabber may have its own conditions.)
member.returns: true if this GrabbableObject can be grabbed by pGrabber, otherwise false.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.Internal_OnPreGrabbed(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: An internal callback that is invoked just before this GrabbableObject is grabbed.
member.param: The Grabber that grabbed this object.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.Internal_OnGrabbed(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: An internal callback that is invoked whenever this GrabbableObject is grabbed.
member.param: The Grabber that grabbed this object.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.Internal_OnPreReleased(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: An internal callback that is invoked just before this GrabbableObject is released.
member.param: The Grabber that released this object.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.Internal_OnReleased(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: An internal callback that is invoked whenever this GrabbableObject is released.
member.param: The Grabber that released this object.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.GrabbableObject.Internal_OnGrabbingJointBroken(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: An internal callback that is invoked whenever this GrabbableObject has a 'grabbing joint' that is holding it break.

members.member:
The base component for all grabbers that implement the 'ConditionalGrab()' method. Also implements repeat grab attempt routine functionality.
The 'ShouldInterruptGrab' event uses a reference to a boolean value as its first argument, if a subscribing callback makes this boolean true any conditional grab will be interrupted. Note that interrupting a grab routine does not end the grab routine, it simply prevents it from attempting any grab.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: P:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.GrabRoutine
member.summary: A reference to the coroutine for an ongoing continous grab attempt or null if none ongoing.

member.name: E:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.ShouldInterruptGrabRoutineDelegate
member.summary: A simple event that has a single argument, a reference to a boolean value, if this boolean value becomes true the conditional grab is interrupted.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.StartGrabRoutine
member.summary: Starts a grab routine that continuously attempts grabs til successful or stopped.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.StopGrabRoutine
member.summary: Stops any ongoing continous grab attempt routine.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.AttemptGrab
member.summary: A simple wrapper for TryGrab() that has no return value. Useful for use with Unity Editor events.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.TryGrab
member.summary: Attempts a conditional grab using the overrideable 'ConditionalGrab()' method..
member.returns: A reference to the GrabbableObject that was grabbed, otherwise null.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.CheckInterruptGrabRoutine
member.summary: Polls all 'ShouldInterruptGrabRoutineDelegate' event followers (and any other and returns true if this component will interrupt a grab based on the subscribers to the 'ShouldInterruptGrabRoutineDelegate' event, otherwise false. Note that interrupted grab routines will not end the routine, they will simply prevent the routine from attempting a grab.
member.returns: true if this component will interrupt a grab routine based on the subscribers to the 'ShouldInterruptGrab' event, otherwise false.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.ConditionalGrab
member.summary: Performs a conditional grab attempt and returns the GrabbableObject that was grabbed, otherwise null.
member.returns: the GrabbableObject that was grabbed, otherwise null.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber.Coroutine_RepeatTryGrab
member.summary: A coroutine that will repeat grab attempts til successful or cancelled.
member.returns: IEnumerator for the coroutine.

members.member:
The base component for all grabbers.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.Grabbing
member.summary: A reference to the object being grabbed by this hand, otherwise null if nothing being grabbed.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.GrabbingJoint
member.summary: A reference to the Joint being used to connect a Rigidbody-containing GrabbableObject, otherwise null.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.AnchorTransform
member.summary: Returns the Transform grabbables are anchored to.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.GrabberPivot
member.summary: Returns the Transform that is used as the pivot point for the Grabber. This is mostly used when positioning the Grabber on a GrabbableObjects 'MaintainGrabTransform' reference.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.GrabPoint
member.summary: A reference to the Transform for the object that was created at the grabber position when the grab occured. Parented to the grabbed object, this means 'GrabPoint' maintains a reference of the hands relative position relative to the grabbed object..

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.IsGrabbingNonKinematicRigidbody
member.summary: Returns true if the Grabber is currently grabbing a non-kinematic Rigidbody, otherwise false.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.JointCount
member.summary: Returns the number of joints that are created by this Grabber (No guarentee that some joint entries will not be null if they are destroyed without using Grabber.DestroyJoint).

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Grabber.CanRelease
member.summary: Returns true if this Grabber may release the object it is 'Grabbing', otherwise false. The 'grabLocked' boolean or SetGrabLocked(bool) method may be used to prevent a release. NOTE: The 'CanReleaseDelegate' event may be used to override release permissions.

member.name: E:GrabSystem.Grabber.CanGrabDelegate
member.summary: A simple event that is passed a boolean by reference that may be overridden to override whether or not a grab can occur.

member.name: E:GrabSystem.Grabber.CanReleaseDelegate
member.summary: A simple event that is passed a boolean by reference that may be overridden to override whether or not a non-forced release can occur.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Grabber.m_Joints
member.summary: A list of Joints that were created by this Grabber.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Grabber.m_GrabbingJointValid
member.summary: Tracks whether or not a GrabbingJoint is expected to be non-null, if true and GrabbingJoint is null then the joint broke.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Grabber.m_GrabbingJoint
member.summary: The hidden backing field for the 'GrabbingJoint' property.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.Grab(GrabSystem.GrabbableObject)
member.summary: Forces a GrabbableObject to be grabbed, if an object is already grabbed it is (attempted to be) released. Same as calling 'Grab(pGrabbable, null)'.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.Grab(GrabSystem.GrabbableObject,UnityEngine.Collider)
member.summary: Forces a GrabbableObject to be grabbed, if an object is already being grabbed it is (attempted to be) released.
member.param: The Grabbable that was grabbed.
The Collider that was grabbed.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.GrabAtOffset(GrabSystem.GrabbableObject,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Quaternion)
member.summary: If pGrabbable is a movable object, teleports it to pOffset and pRotation local space (angle) offsets relative to the Grabber's 'transform', then grabs.
member.param: The grabbable object.
The local space offset.
The local space rotation.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.ReleaseNoThrow
member.summary: Releases the currently grabbed object without throwing it only if 'CanRelease()' returns true.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.Release
member.summary: Releases the currently grabbed object applying any relevant throw forces only if 'CanRelease()' returns true.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.ForceReleaseNoThrow
member.summary: Releases the currently grabbed object without throwing it.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.ForceRelease
member.summary: Releases the currently grabbed object applying any relevant throw forces.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.GetOffsetFromGrabber(GrabSystem.GrabbableObject)
member.summary: Returns the offset of pGrabbable from 'this' Grabber as a Vector3 in local space of 'this' Grabber.
member.param: The grabbable object.
member.returns: the offset of pGrabbable from 'this' Grabber as a Vector3 in local space of 'this' Grabber.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.GetRelativeRotationFromGrabber(GrabSystem.GrabbableObject)
member.summary: Returns the relative rotation of pGrabbable from 'this' Grabber as a Quaternion.
member.param: The grabbable object.
member.returns: the relative rotation of pGrabbable from 'this' Grabber as a Quaternion.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.ThrowRigidbody(UnityEngine.Rigidbody,System.Single)
member.summary: Calculates and applies throw forces to the specified Rigidbody.
member.param: A throw force multiplier to apply to the calculated throw force. Useful for scaling force for specific objects.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.CreateJoint(GrabSystem.GrabbableObject,UnityEngine.Rigidbody,System.Single,System.Single,UnityEngine.ConfigurableJoint)
member.summary: Creates a physics joint between a Rigidbody and the Grabber.
member.param: The GrabbableObject being jointed to.
The Rigidbody that is being jointed to the Grabber.
The force it takes to break the joint.
The torque it takes to break the joint.
The custom grab joint prefab to use. If null the default joint resource will be used.
member.returns: The Joint that was created.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.GetJointAtIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the Joint at the given index of the joints array for this Grabber.
member.returns: The Joint at the given index of the joints array for this Grabber.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.DestroyJoint(UnityEngine.Joint)
member.summary: Destroys a Joint and removes it from this Grabbers tracked joint list if it is in it.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.DestroyAllJoints
member.summary: Destroys all Joints that were created by this Grabber.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.SetGrabLocked(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the 'grabLocked' field of this component. Useful for use with Unity editor events.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.CanGrab(GrabSystem.GrabbableObject)
member.summary: Returns true if this Grabber can grab pGrabbable, otherwise false. NOTE: By default (when not overridden) it is guarenteed that this method takes into account 'CanGrabDelegate' event overrides.
member.returns: true if this Grabber can grab pGrabbable, otherwise false.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Grabber.OnGrabbingJointBroken
member.summary: Invoked when Grabber.GrabbingJoint breaks. When overriding this careful to ensure that the 'GrabJointBroken' event is still invoked and (if desired) that any non-null 'Grabbing' object is released.

members.member:
A component that extends a Grabber by adding the ability to attempt grabs using a raycast.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.GrabbableEntry.grabbable
member.summary: The GrabbableObject reference for the pair.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.GrabbableEntry.collider
member.summary: The Collider that may be grabbed.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.GrabbableEntry.distance
member.summary: The distance of the grabbable according to the pair.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.BoxCastData.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiaets a BoxCastData instance.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.BoxCastData.#ctor(GrabSystem.RayGrabber.BoxCastData)
member.summary: Instantiates a copy of some other BoxCastData, pOther.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.m_CollisionResult
member.summary: Stores the result of a Physics.OverlapBoxNonAlloc with space for up to 10 colliders.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.m_CollisionResultCount
member.summary: The number of valid collision results in the array.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.GrabByPalmTrace
member.summary: Attempts to grab any nearby objects using a ray trace from the palm. Returns the GrabbableObject that was grabbed or null if nothing was grabbed.
member.returns: A reference to the GrabbableObject that was grabbed, otherwise null if nothing.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.ConditionalGrab
member.summary: Attempts to grab using a raytrace.
member.returns: The GrabbableObject that was grabbed, otherwise null.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.DrawBoxCastDataGizmo(GrabSystem.RayGrabber.BoxCastData,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Draws the given box cast data. Uses pBoxCastData.origin to determine position, rotation, and direction.
member.param: The color to draw the gizmo in.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.RayGrabber.DrawBoxCastDataGizmoAt(GrabSystem.RayGrabber.BoxCastData,UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Quaternion,UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Draws the given box cast data at the given position and rotation in the given direction.
member.param: The color to draw the gizmo in.
The position to draw the box cast at.
The rotation to draw the box cast with.
The box cast direction.

A public static class that provides helper functions for floating-point related math operations.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.summary: Greater than.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Math.FloatMath.Comparator.GTE
member.summary: Greater than or equal to.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Math.FloatMath.Comparator.LT
member.summary: Less than.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Math.FloatMath.Comparator.LTE
member.summary: Less than or equal to.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Math.FloatMath.Comparator.APPRX
member.summary: Approximately equal to.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Math.FloatMath.Comparator.NAPPRX
member.summary: Not approximately equal to.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Math.FloatMath.CompareFloat(System.Single,System.Single,GrabSystem.Math.FloatMath.Comparator)
member.summary: Compares the LHS float to the RHS float using pLHS pComparator pRHS.
member.param: The left hand side float.
The right hand side float.
The Comparator to use.
member.returns: true if the comparator condition when comparing pLHS to pRHS is true, otherwise false.

members.member: A static class that contains vector math functions. Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.summary: Returns the signed distance between two vectors pA and pB in a given direction, pDirection.
member.param: The world space direction.

member.summary: Returns a clamped angle between -180f and 180f.
member.returns: a clamped angle between -180f and 180f.

members.member:
A component that is attached to the same GameObject as a GrabbableObject (that is assumed to be using the 'Maintain Offset' grab mode) which overrides the maintain offset behaviour allowing more complex behaviours to be defined using the grab offset of the Grabber from the grabbable at the time it grabbed the GrabbableObject. NOTE: This component works in the grabbables local space by comparing the 'signed distance in direction' of the grabber from the grabbable at the time of grab using the comparator specified in the entry.
Author: Intuitive Gaming Solutions

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByGrabOffset.Entry.Internal_OnUsed(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Invokes the 'EntryUsed' event.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByGrabOffset.GrabInfo.entry
member.summary: A reference to the entry whose conditions were met.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByGrabOffset.m_GrabInfos
member.summary: Tracks how the Grabber was grabbed by a given Grabber.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByGrabOffset.Grabbable
member.summary: Returns the GrabbableObject reference associated with this component.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByGrabOffset.m_Grabbable
member.summary: The hidden backing field for the 'Grabbable' property.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByGrabOffset.CheckEntryConditions(GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByGrabOffset.Entry,GrabSystem.Grabber,GrabSystem.GrabbableObject)
member.summary: A public method that checks if the conditions are met for the given entry, pEntry, based on the relative offset of pGrabber from pGrabbable in pGrabbable local space.
member.returns: true if the conditions for this entry are met, otherwise false.

members.member:
A component that is attached to the same GameObject as a GrabbableObject (that is assumed to be using the 'Maintain Offset' grab mode) which overrides the maintain offset behaviour allowing more complex behaviours to be defined using the relative angle of the GrabbableObject from the Grabber at the time it is grabbed. NOTE: This component works by projecting the 'grabber' onto the local 'axis' in local space of the grabbable and getting the hands angle around that axis.
Author: Intuitive Gaming Solutions

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByProjectedAngle.Entry.Internal_OnUsed(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Invokes the 'EntryUsed' event.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByProjectedAngle.GrabInfo.entry
member.summary: A reference to the entry whose conditions were met.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByProjectedAngle.m_GrabInfos
member.summary: Tracks how the Grabber was grabbed by a given Grabber.

member.name: P:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByProjectedAngle.Grabbable
member.summary: Returns the GrabbableObject reference associated with this component.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByProjectedAngle.m_Grabbable
member.summary: The hidden backing field for the 'Grabbable' property.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByProjectedAngle.CheckEntryConditions(GrabSystem.Poses.MaintainOffsetByProjectedAngle.Entry,GrabSystem.Grabber,GrabSystem.GrabbableObject)
member.summary: A public method that checks if the conditions are met for the given entry, pEntry, based on the relative offset of pGrabber from pGrabbable in pGrabbable local space.
member.returns: true if the conditions for this entry are met, otherwise false.

members.member:
A simple component that uses the 'OnTriggerEnter' and 'OnTriggerExit' callbacks to allow a ConditionalGrabber that enters a trigger to automatically grab a specified GrabbableObject when it fails to grab anything else after a grab attempt while it remains in the trigger.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabArea.m_GrabbersInArea
member.summary: A list of all ConditionalGrabber components that are in the 'grab area' trigger.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabArea.OnGrabberEnteredArea(GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber)
member.summary: Invoked whenever a ConditionalGrabber enters the GrabArea trigger.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabArea.OnGrabberExitedArea(System.Int32,GrabSystem.ConditionalGrabber)
member.summary: Invoked whenever a ConditionalGrabber exits the GrabArea trigger.
member.param: The grabbers index in the 'grabbers in area' list.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabArea.OnGrabAttemptFailed(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Invoked after a Grabber fails a conditonal grab attempt.
member.param: The Grabber that invoked the callback.

members.member:
A simple component that uses the 'OnTriggerEnter' and 'OnTriggerExit' callbacks to force a grabber to release on object when it enters the relevnat trigger. Optionally prevents the hand from grabbing while in the release.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabberReleaseArea.ReleaseMode.None
member.summary: No release.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabberReleaseArea.ReleaseMode.NoThrow
member.summary: Release, but no throw force.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabberReleaseArea.ReleaseMode.Release
member.summary: Release with throwing force.

member.name: F:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabberReleaseArea.m_GrabbersInArea
member.summary: A list of all Grabber components that are in the 'area' trigger.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabberReleaseArea.OnGrabberEnteredArea(GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Invoked whenever a Grabber enters the area trigger.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabberReleaseArea.OnGrabberExitedArea(System.Int32,GrabSystem.Grabber)
member.summary: Invoked whenever a Grabber exits the area trigger.
member.param: The grabbers index in the 'grabber in area' list.

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Triggers.GrabberReleaseArea.OnCanGrab(GrabSystem.Grabber,GrabSystem.GrabbableObject,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Allows a Grabbers 'grab' ability to be overridden.

members.member:
A public static class that provides Compoennt related helper functions.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: M:GrabSystem.Utility.ComponentUtility.GetCopyOf``1(UnityEngine.Component,``0)
member.summary: An extension method for any Component. This method copies the public, non public instance field and property values from pOther to pComponent.
member.returns: pComponent with the fields and properties copied from pOther.
